## Suggester.validPrefixCharacters property

A regex expression used to validate the text directly before the match.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
validPrefixCharacters?: RegExp | string;
```

## Remarks

This will be used when [Suggester.invalidPrefixCharacters](./prosemirror-suggest.suggester.invalidprefixcharacters.md) is not provided.
